li.label: uninteresting insectoid hymn
li.description: What an incredibly uninteresting ritual. Yeah, yeah, insects are cool. Bah.

li.label: awkward insectoid hymn
li.description: The speech was repetitive, and it did nothing to convince me of the divinity of our beloved insects.

li.label: rousing insectoid hymn
li.description: The chanter showed impressing skill and the hymn appropriately extolled the virtues of our way of life.

li.label: entrancing insectoid hymn
li.description: I can still hear the mesmerizing words of the hymn, like a myriad insectile legs crawling all over our bodies.
